channel.title: Francisco Presencia's Blog
channel.description: I enjoy writing my thinking and some times I publish it.

item.title: 🤯 Running PHP in Javascript
item.description: I could get a basic PHP version transpiling and running in pure Javascript. No server needed.

item.title: 🌠 Transferring Github stars
item.description: Explanation of how I moved stars to a new project from an old and undeserving library

item.title: ✨ Better Promises
item.description: Exploring the limitations of Javascript's Promises and what I did to overcome them

item.title: 🙋 Getting a great npm name
item.description: Discovered a way to get taken npm names and shared it with the Javascript community.

item.title: 🏹 Async/Await are awesome
item.description: How these ES7 features can improve and simplify asynchronous Javascript greatly.
